text: Wattle Ridge is a locality in the Toowoomba Region, Queensland, Australia. In the , Wattle Ridge had a population of 36 people. == Geography == The Gore Highway passes through the location from north (Condamine Farms / Cypress Gsrdens midpoint) to west (Bulli Creek). Most of the land in the locality is undeveloped. == References == Category:Toowoomba Region Category:Localities in Queensland
title: Wattle Ridge, Queensland
